list.title: Event
list.description: Enumerated event types for the tracker

list.title: fetchSource
list.description: ! Be very careful when using the fetch data source. ! As poorly implementing it can cause a lot of issues on ! the client side if errors are not handled correctly.

list.title: liquidm
list.description: ! Note: Please do not change the order of the how the mjcx array is structured. ! Doing so will break the SQL query that displays the Liquid M Macros with ! the link clicks.

list.title: liquidm
list.description: ! Note: Please do not change the order of the how the mjcx array is structured. ! Doing so will break the SQL query that displays the Liquid M Macros with ! the link clicks.

list.title: Snowplow.createSnowplowTracker
list.description: Function that abstracts the version selection and returns the appropriate Snowplow tracker instance. This would be the main and only function that needs to be called to create an instance of the Snowplow tracker outside of the {@link Snowplow} namespace.

list.title: Snowplow.importLegacySnowplowTracker
list.description: Imports the Snowplow tracker instance using the legacy javascript tracker. This is dynamically imported to reduce the bundle size of the tag.

list.title: Snowplow.importStandardSnowplowTracker
list.description: Imports the Snowplow tracker instance using the standard and supported javascript tracker. This is dynamically imported to reduce the bundle size of the tag.

list.title: Snowplow.Legacy.createSnowplowLegacyTracker
list.description:
Function factory that creates a Snowplow Legacy tracker instance. The methods included in the tracker are specific to the Snowplow Legacy tracker also known as "v2" in the snowplow docs

This function should not be called directly. Instead, use the {@link Snowplow.createSnowplowTracker createSnowplowTracker } function.

list.title: Snowplow.Legacy.createSnowplowLegacyTracker#setupTrackAddToCart
list.description: A curried function that returns a method to track an add to cart event with the Snowplow Legacy tracker

list.title: Snowplow.Legacy.createSnowplowLegacyTracker#setupTrackRemoveFromCart
list.description: A curried function that returns a method to track a remove from cart event with the Snowplow Legacy tracker

list.title: Snowplow.Legacy.createSnowplowLegacyTracker#setupTrackTransaction
list.description: A curried function that returns a method to track a transaction event with the Snowplow Legacy tracker

list.title: Snowplow.Legacy.record
list.description: !TODO: Update Docs Tracks a "record" event with the Snowplow Legacy tracker. This event is mainly used for internal analytics (I.E. to monitor how many environments are being used, etc.)

list.title: Snowplow.SnowplowTrackerInput
list.description: The input for the snowplow function factories

list.title: Snowplow.Standard.createSnowplowStandardTracker
list.description:
Function factory that creates a Snowplow Standard tracker instance. The methods included in the tracker are specific to the Snowplow Standard tracker also known as "v3" in the snowplow docs.

This function should not be called directly. Instead, use the {@link Snowplow.createSnowplowTracker createSnowplowTracker } function.

list.title: Snowplow.Standard.createSnowplowStandardTracker#setupTrackAddToCart
list.description: A curried function that returns a method to track adding items to a cart with the Snowplow Standard tracker

list.title: Snowplow.Standard.createSnowplowStandardTracker#setupTrackRemoveFromCart
list.description: A curried function that contains a method to track removing items from a cart with the Snowplow Standard tracker

list.title: Snowplow.Standard.createSnowplowStandardTracker#setupTrackTransaction
list.description: A curried function that returns a method to track a transaction event with the Snowplow Standard tracker

list.title: Snowplow.Standard.record
list.description: !TODO: Update Docs Tracks a "record" event with the Snowplow Standard tracker. This event is mainly used for internal analytics (I.E. to monitor how many environments are being used, etc.)

list.title: Snowplow.TrackRecordInput
list.description: The input for the snowplow trackRecord function

list.title: SnowplowBrowserTracker
list.description: General function to represent the snowplow tracker that gets imported to the window

list.title: SnowplowInitInput#appId
list.description: The unique identifier for the client that is sending the event

list.title: SnowplowInitInput#collector
list.description: A snowplow collector url

list.title: SnowplowInitInput#event
list.description: The event that the tracker is configured for

list.title: SnowplowTracker
list.description: Method interfaces that represents a snowplow tracker

list.title: SnowplowTracker#trackAddToCart
list.description: Tracks an add to cart event

list.title: SnowplowTracker#trackRecord
list.description: Tracks a record event, mainly used to do internal analytics on already deployed trackers

list.title: SnowplowTracker#trackRemoveFromCart
list.description: Tracks a remove from cart event

list.title: SnowplowTracker#trackTransaction
list.description: Tracks a transaction event

list.title: SnowplowTrackerInput#appId
list.description: The unique identifier for the client that is sending the event

list.title: SnowplowTrackerInput#collector
list.description: A snowplow collector url

list.title: SnowplowTrackerInput#environment
list.description: The environment template selected

list.title: SnowplowTrackerInput#event
list.description: The event that the tracker

list.title: SnowplowTrackerInput#version
list.description: The version of the tracker

list.title: squareTracker
list.description: The Square Tracker relies on the Google Datalayer Source to track events. There is documentation to improve this more since Square exports variables to the window object.

list.title: TrackRecordInput#appId
list.description: The unique identifier for the client that is sending the event

list.title: TrackRecordInput#environment
list.description: The environment template selected

list.title: TrackRecordInput#version
list.description: The version of the tracker
